language.name: English
cyansh.error.notOp: §cYou don't have the required permission to do that
cyansh.error.disabled.homes: §cThe /home command is disabled. To enable it, enter '/setAllowHomes true' in chat
cyansh.error.maxHomesReached: §cYou reached the maximum number of homes §6(%s§6)
cyansh.message.goToHome: §3You have been teleported to the home %s
cyansh.message.set.maxHomes: §3The maximun number of homes per player is now %s
cyansh.message.set.minOpLevelExeHomes: §3The minimum OP level required to use the §dhome §3commands is now %s
cyansh.message.set.minOpLevelExeHomesOf: §3The minimum OP level required to use the §dhomeOf §3commands is now %s
cyansh.message.set.minOpLevelExeOPHomesO: §3The minimum OP level required to the homeOf commands (OP) is now %s
cyansh.message.set.minOpLevelExeEditConf: §3The minimum OP level required to edit the config is now %s
cyansh.message.getDescription.command.se: §6- §3The §d/sethome <home_name> §3command creates a home with the given name
cyansh.message.getDescription.command.ho: §6- §3The §d/home <home_name> §3command teleports you to the given home
§6- §3The §d/homeof <player_name> <home_name> §3command teleports you to the given home of the given player
cyansh.message.getDescription.command.re: §6- §3The §d/removehomeof <player_name> §3command removes the given home of the given player
cyansh.message.getDescription.command.ge: §6- §3The §d/gethomesof <player_name> §3command lists all the given player's homes
cyansh.message.getDescription.options.al: §6- §3The §dallowHomes §3option defines wether the home commands are enabled or not
§6- §3The §dallowHomesOf §3option defines wether the homeOf commands are enabled or not
§6- §3The §dallowHomeOf (OP) §3option defines wether the homeOf commands can be used by OP players, independently of the trust system
cyansh.message.getDescription.options.us: §6- §3The §duseTranslations §3option defines wether the translation will be used or not
cyansh.message.getDescription.options.ms: §6- §3The §dmsgToActionBar §3option defines wether the messages will be sent to the action bar or not
cyansh.message.getDescription.options.er: §6- §3The §derrorToActionBar §3option defines wether the error messages will be sent to the action bar or not
cyansh.message.getDescription.options.ma: §6- §3The §dmaxHomes §3option defines the maximum number of homes a player can have
cyansh.message.getDescription.options.mi: §6- §3The §dminOpLevelExeHomes §3option defines the OP level required to run the home commands
§6- §3The §dminOpLevelExeHomeOf §3option defines the OP level required to run the homeOf commands
§6- §3The §dminOpLevelExeOPHomesOf §3option defines the OP level required to use the homes of another player without it trusting the players with this permission
§6- §3The §dminOpLevelExeEditConfig §3option defines the OP level required to edit the config
cyansh.message.getCfgOptions.minOpLevelE: §3Minimum OP level required to edit the config : %s
cyansh.midnightconfig.title: CyanSetHome Config
cyansh.midnightconfig.allowHomes: Allow the use of the home commands
cyansh.midnightconfig.allowHomeOf: Allow the use of the homeOf commands
cyansh.midnightconfig.allowOPHomeOf: Allow the use of the homeOf commands (for OPs)
cyansh.midnightconfig.allowOPHomeOf.tool: Allow the use of the homeOf commands by any OP player, even if it is not in the trust list of the player
cyansh.midnightconfig.maxHomes: Maximum number of homes a player can have
cyansh.midnightconfig.minOpLevelExeHomes: OP level required to execute the home commands
cyansh.midnightconfig.minOpLevelExeHomeO: OP level required to execute the homeOf commands
cyansh.midnightconfig.minOpLevelExeOPHom: OP level required to use the homeOf commands (OP)
(This is independent of the trust system)
cyansh.midnightconfig.minOpLevelExeEditC: OP level required to edit the config
